income_messages:
From: m*******2@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-03-01 17:41:20
SUBJECT: Dear Trusting Friend in God,
Dear Trusting Friend in God,
This is Mrs. Melissa Richardson from London, 58 years an aging widow
suffering from long time illness. I have the sum of $17.5M for you to
use the fund for God’s work. I found your e-mail address as a real
Child of God for over a month now that I have been praying about you
to know if really you are working according to the direction of God so
after all my prayers I am convince, and I have decided to contact you,
Please if you would be able to use the funds for the Lord’s work, with
trust reply me with this e-mail address: ( 
mehards02@gmail.com
 )
Thanks
Yours in the Lord
Mrs. Melissa Richardson.
From: m*******2@gmail.com
To: f*****4@mail.wltechinc.top
Time: 2023-03-01 17:46:49
SUBJECT: My detailed explanations.
My dear in the lord,
Thanks for your response back to my request. Actually, my first letter may
come to you as a surprise. i came across your e-mail contact through a
private search while in need of your assistance. I'm writing to you now
with heavy sorrow in my heart, i have chose to reach out to you through
internet because it still remains the fastest medium of communication and i
prayed over it before contacting you as a real child of god. Beside i would
like to explain myself to you. I am from London but married to an african
man from Republic of Benin after I was twenty years old and we live
together in London and since I married my beloved husband I did not
conceived since i married which is most important thing of marriage and
been my dear husband was a god fearing man also love me so much, he did not
complain for any day and for that reasons I made a promised to him that I
will be with him all the day of my life It's not easy to see a lovely man
who can tolerate such from a woman he married without giving a child and
reasons of marriage is to build family while I did not, it means fail him
before his death.
Beside, my husband is from a big family here in Benin and after his death I
decided to leave London and come back to his country to honor him as I
promised, when I came to Benin I fell sick which I did not take it as big
thing and after some months am going down day by day then I went back to
London to see my doctor, through there my doctor recognized the point of my
sickness and also said I have few months to live, my dear in lord, I cried
for one month and ask god is it how you wish to me, if it's how you want me
to end up my life in pain let his wish be done, then I later came back to
my husband home in Benin to complete my promises and my husband senior
brother was in Russian for years without coming home I stay with the junior
one, that is reason I handle over the money to a foreign in that way you
was surprised because he is one I trusted to handle my husband wealth as I
wish, but he refused to pick my call or communicate with me since I lost my
husband.
So please my dear In lord, I wish you should bear with me in my wish
because I can not do what is not right to whom it may be on the earth
because i must answer God at the end if I do. The reason I take this
decision is that my health has deteriorated so badly, I can not do this by
myself anymore. I once asked members of my husband Family here in Benin to
distribute one of my accounts to some charitable organization which they
refused and kept the money to themselves, so, I do not trust them anymore,
as they seem not to be satisfied with what I left for them I will wait to
hear from you.
Thanks,
Your sister in the lord.
Mrs. Melissa Richardson
outbound_messages:
From: f*****4@mail.wltechinc.top
To: m*******2@gmail.com
Time: 2023-03-01 17:41:26
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Trusting Friend in God,
Dear Madam MelissaThank you very much my good friend for taking the time to considerthis offer. as God has an wonderful He is veryzealand look forward to hearing from you soon.
Best,
Aaron
From: f*****4@mail.wltechinc.top
To: m*******2@gmail.com
Time: 2023-03-01 18:41:17
SUBJECT: Re: My detailed explanations.
OMG Melissa, an old bloke in excellent standing in God's work know what he is up to. He is an old gentleman fresh in the light of the modern which means short attention to detail and short attention to modalities.
Best,
Aaron

Yours in the Lord
Mrs. Melissa Richardson.
